articles.title: China Zhifei's COVID vaccine largely works on delta variant: study - Nikkei Asia

articles.content: BEIJING (Reuters) -- A COVID-19 vaccine developed by a unit of China's Chongqing Zhifei Biological Products largely retained its neutralising effect against the Delta variant but there was a slight r… [+1448 chars]

articles.title: Commentary: Indonesia is Asia's new COVID-19 epicentre - CNA
